application_title.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

application_description.message: Displays the weather for multiple locations that you can set using the free weather API provided by Yahoo (Yahoo Weather API).
application_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

warning_nolocation.description: Text to be displayed when no location is defined

action_setlocation.message: Click here to set a new location!
action_setlocation.description: Text to be displayed when clicking on link to set location

warning_nodata.description: Text to be displayed when no data is available for a location

action_updatingsoon.description: Text to be displayed as a notification that data will be updated soon

label_weatherin.description: Label to be displayed as a prefix for the weather location

condition_mixed_rain_and_snow.description: Condition name for: Mixed rain and snow

condition_mixed_rain_and_sleet.description: Condition name for: Mixed rain and sleet

condition_mixed_snow_and_sleet.description: Condition name for: Mixed snow and sleet

condition_light_snow_showers.description: Condition name for: Light snow showers

condition_mixed_rain_and_hail.description: Condition name for: Mixed rain and hail

condition_scattered_snow_showers.description: Condition name for: Scattered snow showers

action_refreshnow.description: Text to be displayed when clicking on link to refresh data

action_viewnextlocation.description: Text to be displayed when clicking to navigate to next location

action_viewprevlocation.description: Text to be displayed when clicking to navigate to previous location

dayofweek_monday.description: Label for day of week: Monday

dayofweek_tuesday.description: Label for day of week: Tuesday

dayofweek_wednesday.description: Label for day of week: Wednesday

dayofweek_thursday.description: Label for day of week: Thursday

dayofweek_friday.description: Label for day of week: Friday

dayofweek_saturday.description: Label for day of week: Saturday

dayofweek_sunday.description: Label for day of week: Sunday

popup_text_viewexernallinks.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup page for links to external forecast data

popup_text_tiptoopen.message: Press Alt+w to open this popup
popup_text_tiptoopen.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup page as a tip for quick open

popup_text_othertips.message: Use the arrows to change locations. Press ESC to close.
popup_text_othertips.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup page for other tips

popup_text_viewimage.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup in the link that opens the main background image details

popup_text_loadingimage.description: Text to be dispayed in the popup near the image preloader animation

options_label_currentlocations.description: Options page label for: Current locations

options_tooltip_addnewlocation.message: Click here to search and add a new location.
options_tooltip_addnewlocation.description: Options page tooltip for 'Add new location' link

options_label_addnewlocation.description: Options page text for 'Add new location' link

options_label_addyourlocation.description: Options page text for 'Add your location' link

options_label_addthislocation.description: Options page text for 'Add this location' link

options_tooltip_addyourlocation.message: Click here to automatically add your current location using geo-location.
options_tooltip_addyourlocation.description: Options page tooltip for 'Add your location' link

options_label_showin.description: Options page label for: 'Show in' (C or F)

options_label_measurement.description: Options page label for: System of measurement

options_label_measurement_metric.description: Options page 'Metric' value for: System of measurement

options_label_measurement_imperial.description: Options page 'Imperial' value for: System of measurement

options_label_timeout.description: Options page label for: Background update timeout

options_label_flickr.description: Options page label for: Use Flickr images

options_text_flickr.message: Use Flickr for background images instead of static images
options_text_flickr.description: Options page description for: Use Flickr images

options_label_labels.description: Options page label for: Show language-specific labels

options_text_labels.description: Options page description for: Show language-specific labels

options_label_extlinks.description: Options page label for: Show external links

options_text_extlinks.description: Options page description for: Show external links

options_label_weatherdate.description: Options page label for: Show weather date

options_label_refreshdate.description: Options page label for: Show last read date

options_label_typelocation.message: Type in a new location to add
options_label_typelocation.description: Options page label for: Type in a new location to add

options_label_pleasewait.description: Options page label for: Please wait

options_label_iconspreview.description: Options page label for: Icons Preview

options_label_supportextension.description: Options page label for: Support this extension

options_label_donateextension.message: Please donate if you like my work!
options_label_donateextension.description: Options page label for: Please donate if you like my work!

options_message_nogeolocation.message: Geolocation is not supported for this Browser/OS version yet.
options_message_nogeolocation.description: Options page message to be displayed when geolocation is not supported.

options_message_nolocation.message: Sorry, no location found at these coordinates! Try to search for your location instead ...
options_message_nolocation.description: Options page message to be displayed when no location is found.

options_label_selectlocation.description: Options page label for: Select this location!

options_text_notfound.message: No location found! Please try to specify City, Country, Code...
